root.name: Yard Sale Hidden Treasures: Sunnyville
root.description: OverviewYard Sale Hidden Treasures: Sunnyville is a hidden objects/puzzle game developed by Slapdash Games for multiple platforms.GameplayYour goal in Yard Sale Hidden Treasures: Sunnyville is to win the Superstar Homes magazine contest by scavenging for better furniture to spruce up a newly purchased home. This is done by visiting neighbor's yards, searching for hidden objects, and doing miscellaneous tasks for them like collecting X number of fish for an aquarium or X number of gold coins from the beach.Once enough items have been found to complete a room in the house, the player moves on to the next room. There are eight rooms in total to fancy up, each requiring about 10 items or so for the upgrade. If all goes well, after completing all eight rooms, the contest will be won and the house will be featured on the front of Superstar Homes.The main career modes has two modes: Timed and Relaxed. Completing the game unlocks a third mode called Tour, which has the player finding all the vital items in a specific location as fast as possible. The neighbors Sunnyville is populated with eccentric characters, most of which have punny names. E. Stein (an Austrian scientist)T. Hugger (a hippie from the 1960s)M.T. Graves (creepy dead guy)J. Dean (a hipster rebel without a cause)Atia (a Greek goddess wannabe)Sandy (a beach babe)Sir Loin of Beef (a valiant knight)Sailor Bob (a sailor named Bob)
